title: Does the category of a YouTube video affect the views? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you ever wondered why children's toys review videos have always received more views than book introduction videos, why gaming videos have always had a huge number of views? The answer is definitely because the content of the video absolutely determines the number of views and the thing you need to do is to select the appropriate categories to be able to develop your Youtube channel on the right way.  Currently, the number of YouTube users is huge and almost every aspect of life becomes the inspiration for Youtubers so that they create videos with diverse content. However, not all content will receive the number of views as expected, it completely depends on the tastes of the audience. There are millions of people access YouTube every day and their use is completely different. We can divide the purpose of Youtube users into 3 main points: 1. Entertainment 2. Study 3. Discover Because the purpose of the viewer is not the same, the different categories will receive different views. According to some recent studies, the categories that get the most views from the audience are: EducationCookingGamingBeauty These are the Categories that receive the most support for the following reasons: We all like to be beautiful and want to be more beautiful every day, so videos about introducing makeup, beauty tips or introducing beauty products always attract a number of views. In this area, we need to mention Huda Beauty, on of the most successful YouTube channel that is the best in beauty channels. It always take the lead in beauty trends as well as create a solid position in the audience's mind. Besides, the need for entertainment for people is always a necessity and that is why after working days people often go to Youtube as a tool for entertainment. They watched funny videos, video review games or MVs. It will makes them feel relax and enjoy after the hardworking time. On the other hand, with the strong development of the internet and the busy pace of human life, it has urged online learning to become more popular than ever. We want to learn new things but don't have time to go to centers or classes. That is no longer the difficulties that people can now fully learn online. Youtube is currently one of the platforms with the most effective online teaching videos. Learning becomes easier, more convenient and more effective than ever. That's why this category always receives great attention from the audience.  Hopefully the information I provide will help you. Wish you find a category that suits you. Good luck.

Main thing here,is Content. Content effects the audience,and that’s something more important for views. In-fact the most important thing is content. if you’re seeking views. So keep tracking if your content matches the stuff required by your audience.
